name: novus-mail
description: NortixMail is a self-hosted webmail system designed to simplify email hosting for individuals or SMEs. It features inbox, filters, address book, and a responsive interface for communications.
features: Webmail interface: Access email through a clean, responsive web interface from any browser.
IMAP/SMTP support: Connect to standard email servers for sending and receiving messages.
Inbox management: Organize emails with folders, labels, and search functionality.
Email filtering: Create rules to automatically sort, label, or delete incoming messages.
Address book: Store and manage contacts with groups for easy email addressing.
Attachment handling: Send and receive file attachments with preview support for common formats.
Spam protection: Filter unwanted emails with built-in spam detection and blocking.
Mobile responsive: Access email from smartphones and tablets with adaptive layout.
Multiple accounts: Manage multiple email accounts from a single interface.
Compose editor: Write emails with rich text formatting, signatures, and templates.
Calendar integration: View and manage events alongside email for unified communication.
Self-hosted privacy: Keep all email data on your own server without third-party access.
